message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially offering it for $18,000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your position, but $18,000 is already a competitive price for this product and its value.  To move us forward, I could consider $16,500.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the value and features of the product, I'd like to propose a price of $15,500. This is my best offer within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $15,500 is closer to what I had in mind, I can't accept it.  To avoid wasting either of our time, I'm willing to close the deal at $16,000.  This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $15,750 for the product. This is my final offer within my budget.
